metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6696 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
inspircd in Debian before 2.0.7 does not properly handle unsigned integers. NOTE: This vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix toCVE-2012-1836.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

inspircd - 2.0.5-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: inspircd package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-1+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
